name: explore
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool worldwide_recipes.
Tool description: Over 2 MILLION recipes, nutrition, ingredients, users and reviews worldwide.
API description: Fetches a list of recipes from the Worldwide Recipes API with optional pagination support.

start.description: The starting point for pagination. Page 1 corresponds to start=0, Page 2 to start=20, and so on.
